ComicInfo.Title: The Cobra's Venom Part 1
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
“The Cobra’s Venom,” Part 1 (of 5)! With a dangerously mysterious weapons shipment enroute to Springfield, can our Real American Heroes—at home and abroad—find a way to stop the evil machinations of… Dr. Venom?! A bombastic new chapter of G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero lore from living legend Larry Hama and exciting new artist Ron Joseph (Revolutionaries)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ron Joseph (a) & James Brown (c) | 1-2 | B | Cover B | John Royale (a), Jagdish Kumar (a) & James Offredi (c) | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Jamie Sullivan (a) & Jesse Heagy (c) | 4 | RE | Comics Vault Exclusive Variant Cover A | Gus Mauk (a) & Tom Long (c) | 5 | RE | Comics Vault Exclusive Variant Cover B | Gus Mauk | 6 | RE | Tri-State Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover A | Tristan Kelly (a) & Nick Wentland (c) | 7 | RE | Tri-State Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover B | Tristan Kelly (a) & Nick Wentland (c) | 8 | RE | Tri-State Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover C | Tristan Kelly (a) & Nick Wentland (c) | 9 |
